Package space.sunqian.fs.object.convert

Interface DataMapper

public interface DataMapper
This interface is used to map data properties from an object to another object. The object should be a Map or a non-map object which can be parsed to MapSchema and ObjectSchema.

A DataMapper typically uses a DataMapper.SchemaCache to cache the parsed DataSchemas, and the thread safety is determined by the DataMapper.SchemaCache. By default, they are thread-safe.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    DataMapper.ExceptionHandler
    Exception handler for copying object property, used to handle exceptions thrown when copying a property.
    static interface 
    DataMapper.PropertyMapper
    Property mapper for copying object property, this interface is called when copying each property.
    static interface 
    DataMapper.SchemaCache
    Cache for DataSchemas parsed during the mapping process.

  • Method Details

    • defaultMapper

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DataMapper defaultMapper()
      Returns the default data mapper.

      The default data mapper will cache the DataSchemas parsed into a ConcurrentHashMap if needed, so it is thread-safe.

      Returns:
      the default data mapper

    • newMapper

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull DataMapper newMapper(@Nonnull @Nonnull DataMapper.SchemaCache schemaCache)
      Returns a new data mapper with the given schema cache. The thread safety is determined by the given cache.
      Parameters:
      schemaCache - the given schema cache
      Returns:
      a new data mapper with the given schema cache

    • copyProperties

      default void copyProperties(@Nonnull @Nonnull Object src, @Nonnull @Nonnull Object dst, @Nonnull @Nonnull Option<?,?> @Nonnull ... options) throws ObjectConvertException
      Copy properties from the given source object to the given destination object. The object can be a Map or a non-map object which can be parsed to ObjectSchema.

      The options parameter can be empty, in which case the default behavior will be used, or built-in options in ConvertOption or other custom options for custom implementations.

      Parameters:
      src - the given source object
      dst - the given destination object
      options - the options for copying properties
      Throws:
      ObjectConvertException - if an error occurs during copying properties

    • copyProperties

      default void copyProperties(@Nonnull @Nonnull Object src, @Nonnull @Nonnull Object dst, @Nonnull @Nonnull ObjectConverter converter, @Nonnull @Nonnull Option<?,?> @Nonnull ... options) throws ObjectConvertException
      Copy properties from the given source object to the given destination object. The object can be a Map or a non-map object which can be parsed to ObjectSchema.

      The options parameter can be empty, in which case the default behavior will be used, or built-in options in ConvertOption or other custom options for custom implementations.

      Parameters:
      src - the given source object
      dst - the given destination object
      converter - the converter for converting values of the properties if needed
      options - the options for copying properties
      Throws:
      ObjectConvertException - if an error occurs during copying properties

      Copy properties from the given source object to the given destination object. The object can be a Map or a non-map object which can be parsed to ObjectSchema.

      Parameters:
      src - the given source object
      srcType - specifies the type of the given source object
      dst - the given destination object
      dstType - specifies the type of the given destination object
      options - the options for copying properties
      Throws:
      ObjectConvertException - if an error occurs during copying properties
